name: Asimov.bypass
description:
Asimov.bypass is a short top-down shooter video game inspired by cyberpunk science fiction. It was created for my HSC Major Work, in which over a year students explore, create and document a project based on an area of passion. I chose this project to expand my skills in game development using the Unity engine for a future career path.

Please feel free to message or leave any questions in the comments. I will also post the results I received when they are available! Additional files developed for this project including a portfolio, website, poster and screenshot gallery are available at: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1wUhE46mlpQ_znp72yYja1FGIL9bJzfzf

The game takes around 10-15 minutes to complete. All elements of the game have been developed by myself with the exception of sound and music, which all belongs to their respective owners/creators.
